resources.string: Very basic gesture nav system only made for the S9+. This is a personal project and no other devices/settings are supported.
Controls how wide the navigation area is. The pill will also fill the entire width of the navigation recognition area.
Controls the height of the navigation area. The entire sensor area is determined by this height.
This controls the display height of the navigation bar. This is only for display properties and does not affect the sensor area of the navigation area.
Changes how round the navigation bar appears. This is only for cosmetic purposes.
Changes how much the navigation area/bar is offset horizontally. Normally this value should be 0 because we want the navigation area and bar to be centered.
Controls how much the navigation area/bar is offset from the bottom of the screen. This is used to offset the changes from overscan hiding the navigation bar.
Changes how intense the vibration is when an action is performed.
Changes the length of the vibration of when an action is performed.
The length of time before the navigation bar fades out. This is in ms and is used to prevent screen burn in.
This determines the primary color of the navigation bar.
This determines the outline color of the navigation bar.
